message: I'm offering you a reasonable $45 while keeping $55. If you reject, remember that inflation will reduce the value for both of us in the next round.

Alice, to counteract the inflation penalty we’re both facing with each round, I propose we settle now. Based on a fair alternating-offer framework (with a 10% discount per round), this division gives me $52.63 and you $47.37. Let’s avoid further loss in value—please accept this offer.
